ygData.subject: Re: ARDUNE IS NOT A GM
ygData.msgSnippet: You are wrong.  Aradune Mithara is a GM. Aradune with GM tag on... http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox04.htm Aradune with GM tag off...
ygData.messageBody:
You are wrong. Aradune Mithara is a GM.

Aradune with GM tag on...
http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox04.htm

Aradune with GM tag off...
http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox22.htm

He also plays a regular character on Veeshan that is not Aradune. He
has not released the name of that character. Here is what he said about
his group though...

"I live in the San Diego area and have a Cox @home cable modem and it
rocks -- very rarely do I have any connectivity problems and/or packet
loss.

My group, which ranges from 15-22, can virtually live in [Permafrost]
with rarely a death. You probably want to bring some friends with ya :)
"

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Simon [SMTP:simon21@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 1:56 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] ARDUNE IS NOT A GM
>
> From: Simon <simon21@...>
>
> actually Ardune (spelling?) is not a GM. why everyone thinks he is i
> don't know. is his name
> green? NO. does he have GM only items? NO! he is played by the lead
> programer Brad McQuade or
> however u spell his last name, hehe. but Ardune is not a GM. he is
> just Brad's character in game.
>
> Tim West wrote:
>
> > From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
> >
> > Yes, he is a GM. In fact this character is used by Brad McQuaid
> (spelling)
> > who is the head programmer for the game. That is why his ranger can
> use
> > the sword. Check out the picture of him at the Fires Of Heaven
> website
> > under "The Killing Of Lady Vox".
> >
> > Tanaman
